eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\displaystyle
\vert g_{ij}  - \delta_{ij} \vert + r \vert \partial_{a}g_{ij} \vert
+ ... + r^k \vert \partial_{a_{1}...a_{k}}g_{ij} \vert +
r \vert K_{ij} \vert + ... + r^k \vert \partial_{a_{1}...a_{k}}K_{ij} \vert
\le {\cal O}\bigg( {1\over r} \bigg), \\
\vert F_{\alpha \beta} \vert + r \vert \partial_{a} F_{\alpha \beta} \vert
+ ... + r^k \vert \partial_{a_{1}...a_{k}}F_{\alpha \beta} \vert
\le {\cal O}\bigg( {1 \over r^2} \bigg).
\
